Package Controller.Communication

Class IntermediaryClass

java.lang.Object
Controller.Communication.IntermediaryClass
public class IntermediaryClass
extends java.lang.Object
Class needed so we could always go back to the original matchManager

    • getMatchManager

      public MatchManager getMatchManager()

    • terminateGame

      public void terminateGame()
      method that finishes game and clears all threads after a 10 second period?

    • Broadcast

      public void Broadcast​(Message msg)
      used to communicate with all 2/3 players of a game only after game has started which means that communication proxies is constant
      Parameters:
      msg - the message to be sent (no error messages)

    • getDisconnected

      public java.lang.String getDisconnected()

    • setCommunicationProxy

      public void setCommunicationProxy​(CommunicationProxy communicationProxy)
      adds a new comm proxy for matchManager to use
      Parameters:
      communicationProxy - the object to be added as new channel for the game to communicate with (or to be put into a waiting list so it is first in line to play the next game)

    • removeCommunicationProxy

      public void removeCommunicationProxy​(CommunicationProxy communicationProxy)
      removes a comm proxy. Called only by matchManager
      Parameters:
      communicationProxy - the communication proxy to be removed from the list (in case of loss/disconnection)

    • getNewCommunicationProxy

      public CommunicationProxy getNewCommunicationProxy()
      Returns:
      the communication proxy from which to call and send messages to the client

    • getMatch

      public Match getMatch()
